page.title: 02THE SIX SCHOOLS IN THURNSCOE
page.content: There are{six schools}in Thurnscoe. {Gooseacre Infant school:} There are fifty one children in the Infant school. Boys and girls start the school from five years of age, and leave at seven years of age. {Gooseacre Junior school:} has got eight classes, there are 219 children, there are boys and girls in the school. They start when they are seven years of age and leave at eleven. {The Hill Infant school:} They start going when they are four years old. Boys and girls can go to the school. People who live in the East end of Thurnscoe can go the the Hill school. {The Hill Junior school: }Boys and girls can go to the Hill Junior school. There are 273 children in the Hill Junior school.
